import React from "react"; import "./TripInfo.css"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; export default function ReccomendationContainer(props){ const {cityName, onClickingSelect, handleNextButtonSubmission} = props; return(

Based on your profile, you might enjoy: {cityName}

Some facts about {}!

Wine country flair

 ) } ReccomendationContainer.propTypes = { filteredCities: PropTypes.string, onClickingSelect: PropTypes.func, onClickingNext: PropTypes.func }
